text: Ceylon, competed at the 1952 Summer Olympics in Helsinki, Finland. ==Athletics== High jump *Nagalingam Ethirveerasingam **Preliminary Round ==Boxing== * Leslie Handunge * Basil Henricus == Diving== Men's 3m Springboard * Allan Smith ** Preliminary Round -- 55.00 points (→ 31st place) == Swimming== * Geoffrey Marks ==References== * Official Olympic Reports * Sri Lanka at the 1952 Helsinki Summer Games Category:Nations at the 1952 Summer Olympics 1952 Category:1952 in Ceylon
title: Ceylon at the 1952 Summer Olympics
